participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: energetic and enthusiastic, enjoys immersive experiences and gaming culture.
participant_1.background: on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i drive a ford pinto. i play a lot of call of duty. i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: caring and community-oriented, passionate about animal welfare and helping others.
participant_2.background: i work fulltime in a shipyard. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i'm ex military. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.
